name: Gavin Darklighter: Master Pilot Trivia Game | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Gavin's original wingman in Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
Riv Shiel.

	Riv Shiel was a Shistavenian wolfman who joined the Squadron at the same time as Gavin. He was killed in Michael A. Stackpole's "X-Wing: The Bacta War", wherein Rogue Squadron broke off from the Alliance and pursued Ysanne Isard.

questions.text: As a child, whom did Gavin have a crush on?
questions.explanation:
Princess Leia.

	When he was just a boy on Tatooine, Gavin harbored a crush on Leia, who later wed Han Solo. The other three choices are people who have been affiliated with Rogue Squadron.

questions.text: How old was Gavin when he joined Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
16.

	He personally asked Wedge Antilles for a spot, and Wedge felt obligated to grant him one as service to Biggs, Gavin's cousin. Luckily, Gavin scored well on the first test he was given, reinforcing Wedge's decision.

questions.text: In capturing Coruscant, Gavin came under attack by which Bothan?
questions.explanation:
Asyr Sei'lar.

	Asyr was about to kill Gavin because she believed he was a bigot. She was part of an anti-human underground resistance movement and intended to kill Gavin as a message to the humans of Coruscant.

questions.text: Which planet did Gavin attempt to defend all alone?
questions.explanation:
Halanit.

	Halanit was a small backwater planet whose people were in desperate need of bacta, a healing salve that works miracles with injured pilots. The starship 'Corrupter' attacked the planet, leaving the outmatched Darklighter to fend them off. He was not victorious, escaping shortly before the planet was destroyed.

questions.text: Gavin convinced his uncle Huff to give the Rogues much needed supplies during the Bacta War.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Huff was a shrewd businessman, and did trade with the Rogues which helped continue their war against the Imperial ruler Ysanne Isard. Booster Terrik was a major reason why Huff helped the Rogues, but Gavin simply claimed that Huff wouldn't get a better deal.

Sera Faleur.

	Sera and Gavin had five children, two adopted and three biological. They wed around 12 ABY, after the Battle of Bilbringi. She was raised near the Silver Sea on Chandrila.

questions.text: Who took over Rogue Squadron after Gavin resigned?
questions.explanation:
Jaina Solo.

	Gavin commanded the Squadron during the Yuuzhan Vong war, fighting in a number of battles. Jaina was given the callsign of Rogue Eleven and flew with the squadron during the war.

questions.text: During the Dark Nest Crisis, what was Gavin's rank?
questions.explanation:
Commodore.

	Commodore Gavin Darklighter served with the Fifth Fleet, being stationed on the refitted Star Destroyer "Mon Mothma". The Swarm War, linked to the Dark Nest crisis, took place in 36 ABY.

questions.text: As stated in "The Bacta War", what color is Gavin's hair?
questions.explanation:
Blonde.

	Despite this, the "New Essential Guide to Characters" depicts him having black hair. Perhaps he dyed it.
